whitepaper

meet baby shiba rocket

Baby Shiba Rocket is a new pup in the crypto world brought to you by a team of experienced crypto marketers, crypto developers and all around crypto enthusiasts. Baby Shiba Rocket is equipped with The Beast Buy Back, is a Hyper Deflationary Coin and Rewards hodlers with every transaction! Coming complete with its own Rocket, over the coming days, weeks and months Baby Shiba Rocket will fly holders to the Moon, Mars and Beyond so don't miss out.

beast buy back

The Beast is our own version of the Kraken/AutoBoost function built directly into our contract. Some of you may be familiar with other buy back tokens, but with The Beast Baby Shiba Rocket is not just another buy back token.

holder rewards

A transaction tax of 5% will be applied and as a reward for hodling investors will receive a proportion of this tax in the form of Baby Shiba Rocket tokens direct into their wallets based on the number of tokens held.

marketing and development

We have been involved in many projects both as investors and as part of the team and the one thing that stood out that decided whether tokens were successful or not was the ability to market and promote the tokens effectively and continuously.

03

choose baby shiba rocket

With our winning combination of tokenomics we are aiming to hit $1bn Market Cap. Our tokenomics ensure that investors are rewarded for hodling with redistributions, that we have continuous price increases using The Beast Buy Back functions and that we generate a generous marketing and development fund. This fund will ensure we are able to continuously promote and develop the token utilities making Baby Shiba Rocket a more attractive proposition to more and more investors while at the same time making us visible to more and more potential investors. It is only a matter of time before we reach target of $1bn Market Cap.

how to buy

01
install compatible wallet

PC Users: Download/install metamask Chrome at this link (https://metamask.io/download.html)

Phone Users: Download/install MetaMask on your phone via your App Store

Create a wallet or import one, remember to store your keyphrase in a safe place

02
set metamask to the bsc network

To switch to BSC Network please visit the Binance Academy MetaMask to Binance Smart Chain

Baby Shiba Rocket is currently only available on the BSC Network

03
fund and swap

Ensure you have BNB or BSC currency in your wallet, if you do not then please first purchase these via 'buy now' on MetaMask

Then go to the browser within MetaMask and paste ........

Recommended slippage is 15%-20%
